Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorPoller
    Class which takes care of color sensor polling, signal filtering as well as odometry correction using the color sensors
    Display
    This class is used to display the content of the odometer variables (x, y, Theta)
    Main
    The main driver class for the odometry lab.
    Navigation
    Class where all of the navigation of the robot is handled
    Odometer
    The odometer class keeps track of the robot's (x, y, theta) position.
    PathFinder
    An implementation of the A* path finding algorithm which only allows cardinal movements on the map
    Resources
    This class is used to define static resources in one place for easy access and to avoid cluttering the rest of the codebase.
    Test
    test and debugging class
    UltrasonicLocalizer
    Thread which is responsible for using the US sensor and the wall rammer to localize in the beginning of the competition
    UltrasonicLocalizerDisplay
    display used during localization to display the states and US reading
    UltrasonicObstacleDetector
    thread for obstacle detection
    UltrasonicPoller
    A poller for the ultrasonic sensor.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Navigation.Orientation
    orientation of the robot
    UltrasonicLocalizer.SearchingState
    states when going through localization
